SELECT post.post_no, post.board_no, post.board_name, post.member_no, post.post_title, post.post_content, TO_CHAR(post.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, post.view_count, post.like_count, post.member_nickname, post.post_status_flag, post.post_notice_flag, post.notice_index, post.cafe_url FROM post, board
post.board_no = board.board_no AND post.cafe_url = #{cafeURL} AND (board.board_type = 'cb100' OR board.board_no = #{boardNo}) AND post.post_status_flag = '0' AND post.post_notice_flag = '1'

SELECT post.post_no, post.board_no, post.member_no, post.post_title, post.post_content, TO_CHAR(post.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, post.view_count, post.like_count, post.member_nickname, post.post_status_flag, post.post_notice_flag, post.notice_index, post.cafe_url FROM post, board
post.board_no = board.board_no AND post.cafe_url = #{cafeURL} AND board.board_type = 'cb100' AND post.post_status_flag = '0'
ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (SELECT p.post_no, p.board_no, p.member_no, p.post_title, p.post_content, TO_CHAR(p.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date, p.view_count, p.like_count, p.member_nickname, p.post_status_flag, p.post_notice_flag, p.notice_index, p.cafe_url, b.best_post_count FROM post p, board b
p.board_no = b.board_no AND p.board_no = #{boardNo} AND p.reg_date >= SYSDATE - b.best_term AND p.like_count >= b.best_like_count
ORDER BY p.like_count DESC ) inner_table
AND ROWNUM <= inner_table.best_post_count
